Factsheet

Developer:
Arachnocoder
Based in Switzerland
Release date:

Steam
Website:
none
Regular Price:

Description

Shuttle Mining is a Noita- and Terraria-inspired mining game. Craft your own unique lasers, burn, taze, and make things explode The gameplay Loop: Craft Lasers: Create your own unique weapons by using modules. Some modules increase a bullet’s size, some make it explosive, and others make it burn. There are nearly endless possibilities! Fight Enemies: Get new modules, you'll need to beat enemies and get the recipes and materials to build modules. Mining: Using good lasers takes a lot of energy. To upgrade the player and your battery, you'll have to dig for ores and minerals and craft new items! So you get better weapons, they'll require more energy and then you mine and craft to upgrade the battery.

History

This is my second game and I'm already pretty far into development. Different from my last game, this is more of my own Idea and not just a mix of 2 games I've played before. I mean I didn't actively get much inspiration from other games. I didn't search for it. When me and my friends played the prototype we were like "hell yeah!", so I think it has some sort of "magic" in it. I mean it has something unique or just a good Hook in the gameplay.

Features

  • Craft Lasers: In Shuttle Mining, you can create your own unique weapons by using modules. Some modules increase a bullet’s size, some make it explosive, and others make it burn. There are nearly endless possibilities!
  • Fight Enemies: In order to find new modules, you'll need to beat enemies and get the recipes and materials to build modules.
  • Mining: Using good lasers takes a lot of energy. To upgrade the player and your battery, you'll have to dig for ores and minerals and craft new items!
